org.apache.karaf.web

Interface WebContainerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebContainerServiceImpl

    public interface WebContainerService
    Describe the WebContainer service.

        Returns:

      • getWebContextPath

        java.lang.String getWebContextPath(java.lang.Long id)
        Retrieve the Web-ContextPath of the corresponding bundle.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the bundle.
        Returns:
        The web context associated with the given bundle.
